landing.title: Revolutionize Your Parts Management
landing.subtitle: Streamline your inventory, sales, and supplier relations with our all-in-one solution. Available in multiple languages to empower your global business.
landing.featureStockDesc: Effortlessly track products with advanced search, filtering, and batch operations.
landing.featureBillingDesc: Generate professional, downloadable PDF invoices in just a few clicks.
landing.featureCrmDesc: Manage contacts and view complete transaction histories to build stronger relationships.

auth.loginSubtitle: Sign in to access your dashboard.
auth.signupSubtitle: Join us and streamline your parts management.
auth.resetPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email to receive a password reset link
auth.checkEmail: Check your email for password reset instructions
auth.resetLinkSent: Password reset email has been sent. Check your inbox.
auth.didNotReceiveEmail: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or try again.
auth.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset. You can now log in.
auth.invalidResetLinkMsg: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
auth.userNotFound: No user found with this email address.
auth.resetLinkExpired: Reset link has expired or is invalid. Please request a new password reset.

auth.resetEmailError: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.
auth.invalidResetLinkError: Invalid reset link. Please request a new password reset.
auth.resetPasswordFailed: Failed to reset password. Please request a new reset link.
auth.passwordResetSuccessMsg: Your password has been reset. You can now log in.

addProductDialog.description: Add a single product manually or import multiple products from a file.

editProductDialog.description: Make changes to the product details here. Click save when you're done.

settings.description: Manage your application and user settings.
settings.notificationsSubtext: Notification sounds will play for all notification types including low stock alerts, system messages, and updates.
settings.companyDescription: This information will be displayed on your invoices.
settings.companySubtext: Manage your company details including registration numbers and bank information.
settings.businessDescription: Set default values for business logic like pricing.
settings.businessSubtext: Configure default profit margins and VAT settings for your business.
settings.juridicTermsDescription: Configure terms for "Facture à termes" invoices.
settings.juridicTermsModalDescription: Define the legal terms and conditions that will appear on your term invoices.

settings.businessRulesDialogDescription: Configure your business settings and default values.
